description:
Caleb
There are two solos of Caleb on this DVD. His first ever solo performance which took place the same day I met him. Caleb and I met at an adult novelty shop and by the time we'd finished talking he was following me home for this performance. Caleb and I would get to know each other very well over the next few months and he'd do many solos. The second solo of Caleb on this DVD features him in a hot jockstrap where he puts on an intense show. Caleb is beautiful and not shy at all. He's a country boy with a big heart and he's ready to share himself with you.
title: Caleb
